version_description:
Intorducing... The biggest update to Teleprompter Premium!

- The CloudPrompter platform now synchronises your scripts and settings across all of your devices automatically
- You can now re-arrange your scripts by title or date
- Fixed bugs in

Intorducing... The biggest update to Teleprompter Premium!

- The CloudPrompter platform now synchronises your scripts and settings across all of your devices automatically
- You can now re-arrange your scripts by title or date
- Fixed bugs in

– Native support for iPhone X
– You can now enable Cloud Sync to synchronise your scripts between all of your devices automatically. This is entirely optional and can be disabled to keep your script data offline.
– Brand new Bluetooth device-to-devi

Intorducing... The biggest update to Teleprompter Premium!

- The CloudPrompter platform now synchronises your scripts and settings across all of your devices automatically
- You can now re-arrange your scripts by title or date
- Fixed bugs in

• New: Record audio using a connected Bluetooth microphone
• Improved PDF compatibility for larger files
• Improved the font picker
• Fixed a crashing issue related to recording video
• Updated the elapsed time for recording video
• Clearer

• New: Record audio using a connected Bluetooth microphone
• Improved PDF compatibility for larger files
• Improved the font picker
• Fixed a crashing issue related to recording video
• Updated the elapsed time for recording video
• Clearer
